elements.label: Charming
elements.description: A charming sailor is quickly befriended, rarely trusted but easily forgiven.

elements.label: Shifty
elements.description: This sailor has a nose for deals that are lucrative, clandestine and less than legal.

elements.label: Engaging
elements.description: A winning smile and a wicked sense of humor. This sailor will help attract a more adventurous crew.

elements.label: Good-Fortuned
elements.description: There is something unsettling about a sailor without tales of hardships. But we are willing to forgive them to gain some of that quiet for our coming voyages.

elements.label: Entertaining
elements.description: Quick to laugh and make other laugh in turn.

elements.label: Unpleasant
elements.description: One who isn't liked is easy to blame.

elements.label: Crude
elements.description: A social lack of subtlety can be the death of many a business deal.

elements.label: Clumsy
elements.description: As likely to cause damage as to repair it.

elements.label: Cowardly
elements.description: With one who has a reputation like this on my ship, I am unlikely to attract a more adventurous sort of sailor.

elements.label: Unlucky
elements.description: When this crewmember takes a watch, fate is more keen to act.

elements.label: Rambunctious
elements.description: This sailor will not improve my standing in ports.

elements.label: Craven
elements.description: This sailor has strong opinions on where a sailor's nose should and should not belong. They will refuse to Explore the unfamiliar.

elements.label: Loyal
elements.description: Now that this sailor has joined the crew, only death could convince them to part.

elements.label: Ill-omened
elements.description: A cloud hangs over this one, and the ships they voyaged with.

elements.label: Wanted
elements.description: This crewmember has the furtive eyes of someone chased, though they will not share their story with me.
